title: Triple Chain Report
summary: Three chains completed on 02 Jul 2025: a 100-hit sprint in 9 min, an 18-hit push in 15 min, and a 60-hit endurance run in 29 min—totalling 700.21 respect.

title: Chain Record Shattered!
summary: The Cartel set a new high of 410.78 respect in a single 100-hit chain. Rewards paid, morale sky-high.

title: Scope Hits 100 / 100
summary: Thanks to consistent Lambda and Sigma runs, our Scope is maxed. Ω-tier heist scheduled this Friday.

title: 25-Minute Chain Marathon!
summary: Privé Cartel executed a flawless 100-hit chain in 25 minutes, banking 411.90 respect with a best hit of 80.00.

title: Faction Hub Launch
summary: New website goes live with live-roster, guides hub and auto-archived news feed.
